features: Gentle Nutrition: Modeled after the complete nutrition and gentleness of breastmilk, this formula offers complete nutrition for babies up to 12 months
Probiotic Formula: Our Gentle formula is specially designed with easy to digest Comfort Proteins, prebiotics (important components in breastmilk), and DHA to help support brain and eye development
Give Your Baby a Good Start: Your baby’s nutritional needs evolve over time. That's why we created the Gerber Good Start line. Made to comfort your baby's tummy and available in a range of products
Wholesome Options: Introduce your infant to complimentary staged products like single grain Cereals and 1st Foods fruit and veggie purees with Gerber infant formulas, probiotic supplements and more

Nutrition For Growing: Like your baby, we're always growing and learning. More than ever we're committed to being your partner in parenthood with quality ingredients, nutritious food and expert guidance
body.description: Gerber good start gentle formula is our closest formula to breast milk and promotes soft stools. Gerber Good Start Infant Formula is the only formula with HMO* (human milk oligosaccarides) and probiotics. Research has shown that hmos support digestive health and the developing immune system. Different probiotics have different benefits.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nourishing formula to nurture your little one Happy tummy, happy baby GentlePro is the first and only infant formula made with a combination of prebiotics and probiotics to keep your growing baby’s tummy healthy. It also includes HMO*, which helps to support their digestive health and developing immune system. *Human Milk Oligosaccharide. Not from human milk. The good stuff inside Our formula offers complete nutrition for your growing baby, modeled after the gentleness of breastmilk with HMO*. With probiotics, it provides everyday comfort for your little one and helps to promote soft poops! DHA & Comfort Proteins Gerber Good Start GentlePro Formula has expert-recommended DHA to support healthy brain and eye development, and small, easy-to-digest Comfort Proteins to help provide comfort for your little one’s tummy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Enfamil!
reviews.reviewText: For babies with sensitive tummies, this is BETTER than Enfamil Gentlease. There are two things I love about it—100% whey protein, and true lactose for the carb.Enfamil (and several other) formulas keep their proteins on the 60:40 ratio, and instead adjust the carb to make it “easier” on baby tummies. For my LO, the corn syrup solids Enfamil swaps in did not do the trick. Similac’s Total Comfort was better, but clumpy—not to mention it uses straight table sugar for the carb. I didn’t feel comfortable introducing sugar to my baby so young, and the clumps caused so much spitup.THIS however was the PERFECT formula. Smooth (even when shaken), easy on tummy, and more natural ingredients than manufactured sugars. Plus, as many doctors will tell you, unless baby has a cow milk allergy it’s better to continue using a normal milk formula rather than soy/etc. So this ticks all the boxes, and I recommend it to ANYONE whose little is having tummy problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the can size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We’ve used many forms of Enfamil and Similac over the year. Our boy liked Similac Advance the most out of what we tried, so we were repeat buyers of it.When Similac advance was sold out on Amazon, we found Gerber Goodstart GentlePro, and it was roughly the same price per oz, so we figured we’d get it and then go back to similac when we were done.To our surprise, our son liked this formula more than the similac, and he would finish the bottle every time (he usually left a little in the bottle with similac). Not only does he like it more, but his BM’s didn’t smell as bad.We have now purchased this formula 3 times, and will continue sticking with this formul until our boy bo longer needs formula.Definitely recommend, especially for the price (which is expensive, because all formula is expensive now-a-days, but the price is competitive compared to similar brands). Definitely worth trying

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Be careful about tapping air bubbles out
reviews.reviewText: This formula is fantastic- We've tried many other formulas, but this one seems to be the best for our little one. It travels well- I had it in to-go containers and it didn't clump. When manually mixing it it does clump up a bit more, but if you use a formula mixing pitcher then it's fine. Be warned though- if you tap the little scoop on the side of the can to remove the air bubbles, that is considered "packing" the formula. When you do this you end up serving 20% more formula than is expected. I tested this by weighing average scoops to tapped scoops to remove the air bubbles. Weirdly enough, even with the large air bubbles at the bottom of the scoop, the amount tends to come out accurate-within a gram or two of the intended 8.7 grams per 2 ounces of water. When you tap the air bubbles out, it came out many grams more- amounting to about 20% more formula to water. This over amount isn't dangerous, but it did cause constipation in our little one and could contribute to dehydration over time. I switched to weighing the formula by a scale and her stools became more regular. You could also just use the scoop as intended and not tap the air bubbles out to get the same result. (Though its very tempting to tap the bubbles out!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’ve been using this formula since switching my baby over from breastfeeding. He transitioned so quickly I was amazed. This formula is one of the best for breastfed babies. Buy It !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Cons: I don't understand why both times that I have gotten this item in the mail it wasn't the same container that is shown in the description or pictureKinda frustrated that it tells me I'll get the one pictured and then I get something elsePro: Overall the product is really good but now it's not available to purchase which is ridiculous

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great option for weight gain
reviews.reviewText: My boy was anyways skinny , he was drinking enfanmil since he was born til he turned 7 months. His weights didn’t gain much and very slow. One of his doctor recommended this formula, ever since we changed to this formula, his weights have increased steadily and he loves the taste !
